TGT_ENCAPSULATE_OFF

public static final int TGT_ENCAPSULATE_OFF
Deprecated. use AseFile.TGT_NO_TRANSLATE_TG instead

Flag to instruct getTransformGroupTree to use only one TransformGroup. if set, all nodes will create a parent TransformGroup for the translation component and a child TransformGroup with the geometry (so that the child TransformGroup can be used for transformations relative to the pivot point)

See Also:
AseFile.TGT_NO_TRANSLATE_TG, Constant Field Values

TGT_GROUP_ONLY

public static final int TGT_GROUP_ONLY
Deprecated. use AseFile.TGT_GROUPS_ONLY instead

Flag to instruct getTransformGroupTree to only create TransformGroups for GROUP nodes.

See Also:
AseFile.TGT_GROUPS_ONLY, Constant Field Values

TGT_ROTATE90

public static final int TGT_ROTATE90
Deprecated. use AseFile.TGT_ROTATE90 instead

Flag to rotate the model 90 degrees on the X axis to cater for 3d Studio MAX using a different coordinate system.

See Also:
AseFile.TGT_ROTATE90, Constant Field Values

Deprecated. Use either getModel to get the mesh or getTransformGroupTree to maintain the concept of groups and named nodes.

Adds this node to the passed hashmap

getTransformGroup

public TransformGroup getTransformGroup(AseFile file,
                                        javax.vecmath.Vector3f pivotOffset)
Returns a TransformGroup containing the geometry loaded relitive to the objects pivot point and translated into place.

Parameters:
file - the parent AseFile
pivotOffset - vector that the geometry array will be offset by (this is NOT a translation but rather the actual values the array of geometry data will be offset by. This value is commonly the pivot point of the parent node
Returns:
a TransformGroup containing the geometry loaded relitive to the objects pivot point and translated into place.

createTransformGroupTree

public void createTransformGroupTree(TransformGroup tree,
                                     Map namedNodes,
                                     AseFile file,
                                     javax.vecmath.Vector3f pivotOffset,
                                     int flags)
Creates a TransformGroup to contain the geometry data (loaded relitive to the pivot point). A second TransformGroup is created and is made a parent of the first one this one additionally is translated into place (the pivot point, less the pivotOffset of the parent) If this node is named, the former TransformGroup is added to the map of named nodes. The latter TransformGroup is added to the tree.

Parameters:
tree - The current TransformGroup branch to which this Node will be added
namedNodes - map of the node names to their TransformGroup to which the created TransformGroup will be added
file - the parent AseFile
pivotOffset - the amount which the translation is offset by (this is usually the pivot point of the parent node)
flags - various options

addGeometry

protected void addGeometry(TransformGroup geom,
                           Map namedNodes,
                           AseFile file,
                           javax.vecmath.Vector3f geomPivot,
                           int flags)
Adds the geometry associated with this node to the passed TransformGroup. The geometry is created relitive to this nodes pivot point. Used by createTransformGroupTree to add the associated geom to the tree.

Parameters:
geom - the TransformGroup to which the geometry data for this node will be added.

getShape

public Node getShape(AseFile file)
Retrieves the shape representing the Ase Geom object. The appearance will be driven by the Material referenced.

getPivot

public javax.vecmath.Vector3f getPivot()
Returns this objects pivot point (in the Java3D coordinate space).

Returns:
this objects pivot point (in the Java3D coordinate space).

applyPivotTranslation

public void applyPivotTranslation(TransformGroup group,
                                  javax.vecmath.Vector3f pivotOffset)
Translates the given transform group by the sum of the objects pivot point less the given offset (typically the parents pivot point).

Parameters:
group - the TransformGroup to which the translation will be applied
